ValidationRule.description: Fields may not be changed in Salesforce if the project is synced in Clarizen.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Id="00e30000000bvR3"), Create_Clarizen_Project__c=TRUE, OR( OR( ISCHANGED(pse__Start_Date__c), ISCHANGED(Go_Live_Date__c), ISCHANGED(ProjectKickoffDate__c), ISCHANGED(pse__Project_Status__c), ISCHANGED(Clarizen_Overall_Summary__c), ISCHANGED(Complete__c), ISCHANGED(pse__Project_Phase__c) ), AND( ISCHANGED(pse__End_Date__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c, "Open - Not Started")), $User.Id!="00550000004PdIQ" ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Some fields may not be changed in Salesforce if the project is synced in Clarizen.
